author: andschwa
body: This is causing the failure   Test Path   Could not find file ' usr bin dotnet new'. At  home andrew monad linux src pester tests Test Path.Tests.ps1 64 char 9           Test Path  Path   usr bin \*   Include vi\*   Should Be $true                                                           CategoryInfo            ReadError    usr bin String   Test Path , FileNotFoundException       FullyQualifiedErrorId   DirIOError,Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.TestPathCommand  Because dotnet new is a symlink, and test path fails on symlinks.  VSO create date - 8/6/2015 7:30:00     VSO closed date - 1/11/2016 14:28:00
title: Fix resolution of symlinks
